name: apple-store-frontend
description: Apple Store Frontend with Authentication and Cart

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html css js assets dist/ || (if not exist dist mkdir dist && copy *.html dist\ && xcopy css dist\css\ /E /I /Y && xcopy js dist\js\ /E /I /Y && xcopy assets dist\assets\ /E /I /Y)

author: ANI
